title: Structure Set
description: Defines a structure set that controls the placement and distribution of structures in the world.

tokens.text: controls structure placement and distribution in the world

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this structure set definition.

fields.title: Description
fields.description: The description block containing the structure set identifier.

fields.title: Placement
fields.description: Defines how structures in this set are placed in the world.

fields.title: Type
fields.description: The placement algorithm type. Valid values: 'minecraft:random_spread', 'minecraft:concentric_rings'.

fields.title: Salt
fields.description: A seed modifier for randomization. Each structure set should use a unique salt.

fields.title: Separation
fields.description: Minimum distance in chunks between structure placements.

fields.title: Spacing
fields.description: Average distance in chunks between structure placements. Must be greater than separation.

fields.title: Spread Type
fields.description: How structures spread within the grid. Valid values: 'linear', 'triangular'.

fields.title: Structures
fields.description: Array of structures in this set with their relative weights.
